title: Hippo Falafel
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Organic, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Kosher, Israeli
description: Simple eatery offering Israeli street food like falafel, hummus, salads - all made-in-house. A soy shawarma and hummus available to take-out by weight. The only non-vegan item is hard-boiled egg in some sandwiches which could be omitted on request. Has gluten free pita.
